src:
男児の名前人気ランク、５位まで１文字…１位「蓮」で女児は「陽葵」

01 Nov 2019, 10:23

　ベネッセコーポレーションは１日、２０１９年に生まれた赤ちゃんの名前の人気ランキングを発表した。男の子は「蓮」が２年連続で、女の子は「陽葵」が４年連続で１位となった。
　近年、男女とも１文字の名前が人気を集めていたが、今年は男子で初めてトップ５全てが１文字の名前となった。特に２位の「律」は昨年４７位から大幅にランクアップ。昨年放送されたＮＨＫの連続テレビ小説「半分、青い。」のヒロインの幼なじみの名前だったことが影響したとみられる。
　「新」（男子９位）や「大和」（同１０位）、「紬」（女子５位）や「咲良」（同６位）など、新時代の到来や日本の伝統、和のイメージを連想させる名前も順位を上げた。
　調査は１９年１月１日から９月２９日までの間に生まれた１７万１１１１人を対象に行った。
text:
Name popularity rank of boys, 1 character up to 5th place ... 1st place "Lotus" and girl is "Yangen"

01 Nov 2019, 10:23

Benesse Corporation announced the popularity ranking of baby names born in 2019 on the 1st. As for boys, “Lotus” was ranked first for the second consecutive year, and for girls “Yangshu” was ranked first for the fourth consecutive year.
In recent years, one-letter names have gained popularity for both men and women, but this year, for the first time for men, all five of the top names became single-letter names. In particular, the 2nd place “Ritsu” has been greatly upgraded from 47th place last year. It seems that it was influenced by the childhood friend name of the heroine of NHK's TV novel “Half, Blue.” Broadcast last year.
“New” (9th place for boys), “Yamato” (10th place), “Samurai” (5th place for women) and “Saki Ryo” (6th place) The name reminiscent of has also moved up.
The survey was conducted on 171,111 people born between January 1 and September 29, 2007.
